note: United Fresh Produce Association member directory is not publicly accessible. This association merged with PMA to form IFPA (International Fresh Produce Association) on January 1, 2022.

access_information.access_requirement: Members-only access through freshproduce.com account login
directory_features: Search by company name, country, state, or city
Filter by business type (packinghouses, produce handlers, distributors, etc.)
Access to attendee lists and membership directories

how_to_access.step_1: Create IFPA membership account at https://www.freshproduce.com/membership/
how_to_access.step_2: Log in to your account at freshproduce.com
how_to_access.step_3: Click 'directories' from the light green navigation stripe at top
how_to_access.step_5: Use search and filter tools to find packinghouses and produce handlers
how_to_access.alternative: Contact IFPA directly at their headquarters in Washington, DC for non-member directory access

known_packinghouse_companies.name: Del Monte Fresh Produce, N.A., Inc.

additional_resources.description: United Fresh industry news and updates

limitations: This data represents limited publicly available information. For comprehensive packinghouse and produce handler data from United Fresh/IFPA, membership registration is required. The known companies listed above were identified from publicly available articles and news sources mentioning United Fresh members.
